select t.*,s.shopname,(t.tasknum-t.canreceivenum) receivingnum,b.deliverynum,b.ordernum from T_task_Base t left join t_shop_base s on t.storename = s.id left join (select taskid,sum(confirm) confirmnum,sum(delivery) deliverynum,sum(order1) ordernum from (select taskid,case when taskstate=4 then 1 else 0 end confirm, case when taskstate=3 then 1 else 0 end delivery, case when taskstate=2 then 1 else 0 end order1 from t_my_task_detail) a group by taskid) b on t.id=b.taskid

SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT t1.*, ( SELECT count(*) + 1 FROM T_task_Base t WHERE t.storename = t1.storename AND t.id < t1.id AND t.STATUS = '0' AND t.canreceivenum > 0 and DATE_FORMAT(t.effectdate,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(curdate(),'%Y-%m-%d') ) AS group_id FROM T_task_Base t1 where t1.STATUS = '0' AND t1.canreceivenum > 0 and DATE_FORMAT(t1.effectdate,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(curdate(),'%Y-%m-%d') group by t1.t_url,t1.storename ) a WHERE a.group_id <= ${count} ORDER BY storename, group_id

select sum(t.actualprice*t.tasknum) sumActualprice,sum(deliveryPrice) sumDeliveryPrice,sum(orderPrice) sumOrderPrice,sum(count) sumCount from t_task_base t LEFT JOIN (select taskid,sum(deliveryPrice) deliveryPrice,sum(orderPrice) orderPrice,count(1) count from (select taskid,case when taskstate=3 then pays else 0 end deliveryPrice, case when taskstate=2 then pays else 0 end orderPrice from t_my_task_detail where (create_date BETWEEN #{createDate1} and #{createDate2})) a group by taskid ) b on t.id=b.taskid where shopid=#{createby} and (create_date BETWEEN #{createDate1} and #{createDate2})
